name: cerb.ticket.assign
description: An interaction for quickly assigning tickets
script:
inputs:
  record/ticket:
    record_type: ticket
    required@bool: yes
  text/unassign:
    type: bool

start:
  decision/action:
    outcome/unassign:
      if@bool: {{inputs.unassign}}
      then:
        set:
          prompt_worker_id: 0
    outcome/else:
        then:
          await/owner:
            form:
              title: Assign
              elements:
                sheet/prompt_worker_id:
                  label: To which worker:
                  required@bool: yes
                  data:
                    automation:
                      uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
                      inputs:
                        record_type: worker
                        query: group:(id:{{inputs.ticket.group_id}}) isDisabled:n sort:firstName
                  schema:
                    layout:
                      style: grid
                      filtering@bool: yes
                      headings@bool: no
                      paging@bool: yes
                    columns:
                      selection/id:
                        params:
                          mode: single
                      icon/image:
                        params:
                          record_uri@raw: cerb:worker:{{id}}
                          text_size@raw: 250%
                      text/_label:
                        params:
                          bold@bool: yes
                          underline@bool: no
                          text_size@raw: 125%
                      text/title:
                submit:
                  continue@bool: no
                  reset@bool: no

  record.update/ticket:
    output: updated_ticket
    inputs:
      # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/records/types/ticket/#records-api
      record_type: ticket
      record_id: {{inputs.ticket.id}}
      fields:
        owner_id: {{prompt_worker_id}}
